record.description: First building erected on the University campus. Amos Alonzo] Stagg used the frame shanty as a temporary men's dressing room for his athletes. From the Chicago Times-Herald, May 2, 1897. (Original clipping can be found in Amos Alonzo Stagg Papers, Series VIII, University of Chicago Athletic Scrapbooks.)
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Mounted on board. Originally a press clipping. Taken from Stagg scrapbooks.
